model.name: tests
model.label: Tests Data
model.description: Array of test objects from getSchedulerData query

model.name: testStands
model.label: Test Stands Data
model.description: Array of test stand objects from getTestStands query

model.name: allTestIds
model.description: All test IDs managed by the scheduler (for the delete step in save)

model.name: saveState
model.label: Save State
model.description: idle = normal, saving = dims and locks the component, error = shows error banner. Wire this to your query loading/error states.

model.name: changeoverHours
model.label: Changeover Hours
model.description: Hours for changeover between tests (work hours only)

model.name: inProgressStatus
model.label: In-Progress Status Value
model.description: The test status string that identifies currently-running tests.

model.name: queuedStatus
model.label: Queued Status Value
model.description: The test status string that identifies tests waiting to be scheduled.

model.name: cardMainText
model.label: Card Title
model.description: Template for card title. Use {fieldName} for data fields.

model.name: cardSubText
model.label: Card Subtitle
model.description: Template for subtitle. Hidden when all fields are empty.

model.name: cardInfoRow
model.label: Card Info Row
model.description: Template for the info row shown on cards and bars.

model.name: tooltipTemplate
model.label: Tooltip Template
model.description: Template for hover tooltip. Use \\n for newlines.

model.name: hasUnsavedChanges
model.description: Whether there are unsaved allocation changes
